text: We kꞌo jun karil ri rachalal kubꞌan jun makaj ri man rech ta kamikal, chubꞌana chꞌawem puꞌwiꞌ rech kaya na ukꞌaslemal rumal ri Dios. Are tajin kinbꞌij jun ri kubꞌan mak ri man kakꞌaman ta bꞌik pa kamikal. Kꞌo jun makaj ri kakꞌaman bꞌik pa kamikal, man kinbꞌij ta in chi utz kabꞌan chꞌawem puꞌwiꞌ ri winaq ri kubꞌan we mak riꞌ.
